title: Real-Time AI Apps: Using Apache Flink for Model Inference
author: Kai Waehner
description: Remote model inference with Apache Flink for AI and GenAI use cases provides a scalable, flexible and resilient approach to making data-driven decisions.
cntitle: 实时AI应用：使用Apache Flink进行模型推理
cndescription: 使用Apache Flink进行远程模型推理，为AI和生成式AI用例提供了一种可扩展、灵活且具有弹性的数据驱动决策方法。
